ygData.messageBody:
As a necromancer I have to say that people think we have so
much power....you should try playing one.

Though our Drain spells do not get resisted....They are not
the killer spells you believe them to be.

When fighting a mob I have at 20th level 2 whole buffs only
one of them adds hp's....a whole whopping 30.

My level 20 drain spell does 65 damage and transfers that to
me Not much when a Mob is hittting you for 44 a pop, and
usually multiple hits.

Now to hear that full groups of high level Necro's have
acheived the task of destroying a Griffon, or a Giant? I say
Good job.

For those of you out there that are thinking that Necro's
are too powerful? Our spells take a full second more (At
LEAST) to cast than all the other classes....that is one
aspect that has not been explored.

Our pets are not as strong as a Magicians either.

When fighting a magician sends in the pet...and blasts away
from behind.
We Necro's must go in and take some hits....then use our
drains to heal while the pet get demolished.

I hate it when one player says..."My class is too
weak....look at that class....they are too strong."

If you think so...play that class...make a educated
decision.

I personally think that all the classes I have played have
been VERY WELL balanced.
The Enchanter has had a rough start and is still strugling,
but that is a fault of Verant not having completed thier
skills. (Ahem....you weren't the only ones...Rogue's too
were givin the short end of the stick.)

I personally LOVE an enchanter in my group...if you have
ever grouped with one you know the joys of having your
monster turned into a much weaker...much smaller...much
slower version of itself. Enchanters are NOT cannon
mages...and they are not supposed to be. They can Debuff
and buff better than anyone. So what if others get those
spells at higher levels....If you group...they will gladly
leave you your specialty so that they can cast MORE
drains...and less of the others.

Enchanters CAN solo also...albiet not very well.
They have thier pets now.
Verant is working on them.
Give them time.
The Enchanter you make fun of now will come back to kick
your arse in later levels.
(Personal Experience)

Sorry for this rant but it had to be said.
